What is a personality (profile)? - Representative, or position information

training.department:
If you don't have departments,
Please click the skip or the X icon in the upper right corner of the pop-up.
If you have one or some departments,
You can click on “Add the department here” > Write down your department name > Enter
You can create more than one department.
training.department_setting:
If you have one or some departments
You can click on “Add the department here” > Write down your department name > Enter
You can create more than one department.
training.service_type:
You can create and modify the services that you want to provide
Ex 1) 비춰보기, 논의미팅
Ex 2) 자유고민회, 협의회
Ex 3) 등등..
